name: OR_COST_CHARGE
description: The OR_COST_CHARGE table stores the general information about Cost, Charge Code and Charge Markup tables.

columns.name: COST_TABLE_ID
columns.description: ID of the Cost/Charge Code Table. This is an unique ID for each Cost/Charge Code Table.

columns.name: COST_TABLE_ID_COST_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the Cost/Charge Code Table

columns.name: COST_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: Name of the Cost/Charge Code Table
